column2: IAC/Interactivecorp., formerly IAC Holdings Inc., is a media and Internet company. The Company operates its business through six segments: ANGI Homeservices, Vimeo, Dotdash, Applications, Ask Media Group and Emerging & Others. The Company’s ANGI Homeservices connects of home service professionals across 500 different categories, from repairing and remodeling to cleaning and landscaping, with consumers through category-transforming products under brands such as HomeAdvisor, Angie's List, Handy and Fixd Repair. The Company’s Vimeo segment operates a global video platform for creative professionals, small and medium businesses, organizations and enterprises to connect with their audiences, customers and employees. The Dotdash is a portfolio of digital brands providing information and inspiration in select vertical content categories. Its Applications segment consists of Desktop, which includes its direct-to-consumer downloadable desktop applications.
